statements: SELECT * FROM security_equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity_in_stock FROM security_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, location FROM security_equipment_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM security_equipment_inventory ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity_in_stock FROM security_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10 ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity_in_stock, location FROM security_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0 ORDER BY location ASC, equipment_name DESC
SELECT equipment_name, quantity_in_stock FROM security_equipment_inventory WHERE location = 'Main Office' OR location = 'Warehouse'
SELECT * FROM security_equipment_inventory WHERE location LIKE 'Facility%' AND quantity_in_stock > 5
SELECT equipment_name, SUM(quantity_in_stock) AS total_stock FROM security_equipment_inventory GROUP BY equipment_name HAVING total_stock > 10
SELECT equipment_name, quantity_in_stock FROM security_equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM security_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM security_equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT location, equipment_name FROM security_equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM surveillance_system WHERE camera_count > 5;
SELECT system_id, system_name FROM surveillance_system ORDER BY system_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT system_name, camera_count FROM surveillance_system WHERE camera_count > 5;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM security_equipment WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM security_equipment WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT equipment_name, location, quantity FROM security_equipment WHERE equipment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM security_cameras;
SELECT camera_id, camera_name, location FROM security_cameras WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT camera_id, resolution, status FROM security_cameras WHERE location LIKE '%entrance%';
SELECT * FROM access_badges ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT badge_id, badge_holder_name, access_level FROM access_badges WHERE department = 'Security' AND access_level = 'high';
SELECT * FROM security_cameras ORDER BY camera_name DESC;
SELECT camera_id, camera_name, location FROM security_cameras WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT camera_id, camera_name, resolution FROM security_cameras WHERE resolution LIKE '%1080p%' ORDER BY camera_id ASC;
SELECT camera_id, status, last_checked_at FROM security_cameras WHERE last_checked_at > '2022-01-01' AND status = 'active';

SELECT s.camera_name, a.badge_holder_name, l.event_type FROM security_cameras s INNER JOIN surveillance_log l ON s.camera_id = l.camera_id INNER JOIN access_badges a ON l.badge_id = a.badge_id WHERE l.action_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM security_equipment;
SELECT id, name, location FROM security_equipment WHERE type='CCTV';
SELECT name, quantity FROM security_equipment ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='IT' AND position='Engineer';
SELECT equipment_id, log_timestamp, log_description FROM equipment_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_equipment ORDER BY name DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, type, location FROM security_equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT e.name, e.position, d.department FROM employees e JOIN employees d ON e.manager_id = d.employee_id;

SELECT el.log_id, el.log_timestamp, el.log_description, e.name AS employee_name, se.name AS equipment_name FROM equipment_logs el JOIN employees e ON el.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN security_equipment se ON el.equipment_id = se.id;

SELECT mr.maintenance_date, mr.maintenance_description, se.name AS equipment_name FROM maintenance_records mr JOIN security_equipment se ON mr.equipment_id = se.id WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM security_cameras;
SELECT camera_model, status FROM security_cameras;
SELECT technician_name, experience_years FROM technicians;
SELECT location_name, address, region FROM locations;
SELECT camera_id, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory;
SELECT camera_id, camera_model, status FROM security_cameras;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT inventory_id, camera_id, last_updated FROM inventory ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT technician_name, experience_years FROM technicians WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
